TopicTitle: Force applied location from engine thrust

Articles.Content:
Okay.

I'm currently trying to get a couple mods to play nice (my Vertical Velocity mod and the Throttle Controlled Avionics mod) and I'm close.

However, I'm now wondering about thrust location.

More exactly, on an engine part, does the thrust force get applied to the engine model entirely, so the thrust is effectively from the center of the model, or does the thrust get applied at the thrust transform, so the thrust is applied to the engine model at the origin of the thrustTransform object?

If this answer is not known, how do I go about testing this without making a test model?

(I will install the model editing stuff if needed, but I don't have any of it ready to go at the moment.)

D.

does the thrust get applied at the thrust transform

yes it does

Alright, thank you.

That would explain most of the oddities I'm seeing, but makes implementing a solution more complex.

D.
